title: A godly ballad of the just man Job. Wherein his great patience he doth declare, his plagues and miseries, and yet did not despair. The tune is, The merchant.
publisher: Printed for F[rancis]. Coles, T[homas]. Vere, I[ohn]. Wright, J[ohn].Clarke, W[illiam]. Thackeray, and T[homas]. Passenger.,
